str2: Carefully, exactly, strictly, distinctly. Adverb from the same as akribestatos; exactly.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From peri and pateo; to tread all around, i.e. Walk at large; figuratively, to live, deport oneself, follow.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Wise, learned, cultivated, skilled, clever. Akin to saphes; wise.
